hero.title: We are
hero.subtitle: Need five different agencies for one project? That's like trying to assemble the Avengers from random passersby.

snippets: export default class Fredonbytes extends Excellence {}

hero.subtitle2: We're the complete team that assembled ready for action. We have developers who build code faster than Ironman suits up, designers with Thor's vision, and strategists with Black Widow's cunning. One agency, all superpowers.
hero.subtitle3:
Stop complicating things. Assemble us instead.
We are FredonBytes.
